biography:
From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

Steven R. "Steve" Schirripa (born September 3, 1957) is an American actor and television producer, best known for playing Bobby Baccalieri on The Sopranos.

He is currently the host of Face the Ace and Nothing Personal.
